comments.author: jonathan.protzenko@gmail.com
comments.text:
I'm using a copy of the gloda autocompleter so I initially thought the error was mine (for the autocompletion when typing a recipient's name in "compose in a tab"), but then it turned out the exact same error happens when typing "han" in the gloda search box.

-- Exception object --
+ message (string) 'val.identities is null'
+ fileName (string) 'file:///home/jonathan/Sources/objdir-comm-central/mozilla/dist/bin/components/glautocomp.js'
+ lineNumber (number) 250
+ stack (string) 306 chars
+ name (string) 'TypeError'
*
-- Stack Trace --
ContactIdentityCompleter_complete([object Object],"han")@file:///home/jonathan/Sources/objdir-comm-central/mozilla/dist/bin/components/glautocomp.js:250
("han","global",null,[object XPCWrappedNative_NoHelper])@file:///home/jonathan/Sources/objdir-comm-central/mozilla/dist/bin/components/glautocomp.js:546

It's my test profile so I can definitely send you the gloda database from it if you're interested.
